#summary File Menu

=File Menu=

The following commands are available from the File menu:

  * [AddressBook Address Book]
  * [Connecting Connect To...]
  * [AutoConnects Manage Auto-Connects]
  * Reconnect
  * Disconnect
  * Close Connection
  * Reconnect All
  * Show Connection Stats
  * [MSSP Show MSSP Info]
  * Exit
